info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.operate.wifi
info.description: Proto definitions for runtime WIFI info on sites.

get.description: Get WIFI configuration from the node

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

parameters.name: site
parameters.description:
Site Name

x-example: "value"
Name of the site

parameters.name: node
parameters.description:
Node Name

x-example: "master-0"
Name of the node

wifiSignalStrength.description:
Current Signal Strength

 - UNAVAILABLE: UNAVAILABLE

Signal not received
 - EXCELLENT: EXCELLENT

dBm greater then -50
 - GOOD: GOOD

dBm between -50 and -60
 - FAIR: FAIR

dBm between -60 and -70
 - POOR: POOR

dBm lower then -70
wifiSignalStrength.title: SignalStrength

bssid.description:
The BSS service set identifier.  In infrastructure mode, this is the
 hardware address of the wireless access point that a client is associated
 with.

Example: ` "02:18:5a:2e:ef:61"`
bssid.title: bssid

connected.description:
Whether the device is connected to wifi

Example: ` "true"`
connected.title: connected

frequency.description:
The frequency used by the BSS, in MHz.

Example: ` "5200"`
frequency.title: frequency

receive_bitrate.description:
The current data receive bitrate, in bits/second.

Example: ` "702000000"`
receive_bitrate.title: receive_bitrate

signal.description:
The signal strength of this station's connection, in dBm.

Example: ` "-53"`
signal.title: signal

ssid.description:
The service set identifier, or "network name" of the BSS.

Example: ` "Volterra-Guest"`
ssid.title: ssid

transmit_bitrate.description:
The current data transmit bitrate, in bits/second.

Example: ` "866700000"`
transmit_bitrate.title: transmit_bitrate

ssid.description:
The service set identifier, or "network name" of the BSS.

Example: ` "Volterra-Guest"`
ssid.title: SSID

Example: ` "value"`
namespace.title: Namespace

wifiWifiInfoResponse.description: Runtime WIFI information obtained from site.

ssid.description:
The service set identifier, or "network name" of the BSS.

Example: ` "Volterra-Guest"`
ssid.title: SSID

wifi_item.description: List of available WIFI networks to connect from wifi scan
wifi_item.title: WIFI item

wifiWifiSecurity.description:
WifiSecurity mechanism of authentication

 - UNKNOWN: UNKNOWN

Unknown mechanims is not available to get
 - NONE: NONE

None represent no authentication used
 - WPA2_PERSONAL: WPA2_PERSONAL

WPA2 Personal (PSK) passprase should be used for wifi setup
 - WPA2_ENTERPRISE: WPA2_ENTERPRISE

WPA2 Enterprise (802.1X) EAP - TLS TTLS
wifiWifiSecurity.title: WifiSecurity

namespace.description:
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

Example: ` "value"`
namespace.title: Namespace
